name: 瓦哈伊·阿里
introduction: Wahaj Ali is a Pakistani actor, born in Lahore, Pakistan. He graduated from the University of Central Punjab with a degree in finance before pursuing a career in acting. He worked at Samaa TV as a assistant producer and then as a producer at GEO TV. He made his debut in the entertainment industry with the drama serial "Mera Dard Na Jane Koi" in 2015, which earned him critical acclaim and a loyal fan base. He has since appeared in numerous popular dramas such as "Ishq Ibadat," "Haiwan,", "Bikhray Moti" and "Tere Bin". Wahaj is known for his versatile acting skills and his ability to bring depth and authenticity to his characters. He has also won several awards, including the Best Supporting Actor Award at the 9th Hum Awards for his role in "Ehd-e-Wafa." Outside of acting, Wahaj is also a skilled cricketer and enjoys playing the sport in his free time.
